message: And they're going to do WHAT exactly to us? The fool can't feed his own people, how's he going to face us? Venezuelans were foolish during the past dictatorship they're fools now too.

Funny thing is, the FBI did not put up those cameras. They were installed by the US Fish & Wildlife Service to keep track of poachers entering the refuge, as well as filming wildlife. Those idiot out of staters have no clue about anything.

What a load of shite

Therefore anyone wanting a gun should be required to take a battery of classes and prove their competence in it's use and safe keeping. If people kill people let's at least train them so that fewer accidentally kill people with guns.

Don't worry it is! We have ads (or have had in the past) ways to reduce fat in your diet, increase the amount of iron, ads for pork and how it is leaner than some other meats, ads for fruit and veg (2 fruit and 5 veg a day). Some of them are aimed at kids and some for adults.

Fifty four percent of the Federal budget is spent on the military while our infrastructure and industrial base decays. We spend more on military then the next eleven highest spending nations spend combined. For all that, we should be pissed and screaming, not cowering in fear. A laughably transparent conman demagogue like Trump calls the military a 'disaster', and all the suckers just swallow it right up. But I support Trump on one thing, it is time for Germany, France, England, and Japan to pay their fare share of national defense.
AGREE AGREE AGREE!
Rana

We/USA are the laughing stock of the world. With our guns are more important than people lives!!!! Does not matter what the age or where the massacre. Guns and the push of the NRA rally every time. Other civilized countries can and do have better laws on gun control. I'm not a paranoid person who sees shadows and someone coming for them at every turn. What I do see are children gunned down, normal every day people at movies gun down, Universities students gun down, Marines gun down, people in a church gun down. This is real life for us now. Not a TV show. We are in a sad state of affairs. It's not the Presidents fault. He has talked and talked upon every slaughter. This is greed, selfishness, and paranoia.
Can't hurt I suppose
